scripts.generate-types: rm -rf ./src/types/contentful/*.ts && export $(cat .env.build | awk '!/^\s*#/' | awk '!/^\s*$/'); cf-content-types-generator --spaceId $CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID --token $CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_TOKEN -o src/types/contentful -X; cd src/types/contentful; for file in Type*.ts; do base_name=$(echo "$file" | sed 's/^Type//; s/Page\.ts$//'); mv "$file" "Contentful${base_name}PageType.ts"; done; cd -; prettier --write src/types/contentful
